step1.title: Pick your currencies
step1.desc: Use the dropdowns to choose the currency you're converting from (e.g. USD) and the one you're converting to (e.g. GHS).

step2.title: Enter amount
step2.desc: Type how much money you want to convert in the input field. The conversion will be done automatically.

step3.title: Get instant results
step3.desc: You'll see the live exchange rate update in real-time as market conditions change.
